Data: Toss: Australia have won the toss and they will bat first. We will get the teams up shortly.
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run on target straightaway, cramps him up for room and he pushes it back to the bowler
Mohammad Asif to Watson, FOUR runs that's a late evening slash, Asif's very very generous with his width, short as well, Watson sends that flying over the slips, see you later
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run good comeback,he gets the ball to nip back and he chops it down towards slip
Mohammad Asif to Watson, no run reckless slash outside the off stump, seems to be in a hurry to move on

Mohammad Asif to Watson, 2 runs in the air and right in the middle of two fielders! He doesn't fully control the pull and short fine leg runs back, but Nazir dives forward and collects it from the deep
Mohammad Asif to Watson, 1 run tucks it to the on side and retains the strike
Naved-ul-Hasan to Watson, no run gets away with a delivery down the leg side on his pads, tries to work it away but the ball rolls to the keeper off his pads
Naved-ul-Hasan to Watson, 1 run gets beside the line and steers him just wide of first slip
Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, FOUR runs super way to get off the mark, Naved errs by pitching it full and giving him width, he chops it hard onto the ground and the ball races past the covers
Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, no run holds the length back and he taps it back to the bowler

Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, 2 runs, OUT super throw from the deep and the third umpire has a look, Warner latches on to the width outside off and slices it in the air just over backward point, Umar Akmal runs back from cover point, slides and fires a flat throw to the keeper, Watson wasn't quick enough on the third run
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 2 runs whoopsy! Clarke slips at the the crease as he whips it away to the on side and he's on all fours, watch out for the stumps, Pup
Mohammad Asif to Warner, 1 run shuffles and clips him down to the on side
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, FOUR runs too wide outside off, gentle pace too, he has enough time to roll his wrists and push it away effortlessly wide of backward point
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run pushes it down the track and tells his partner to wait
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run almost an action replay, Clarke gets forward a bit too early and he hits it back to the bowler
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 2 runs angles towards the pads and he calls for the second run the minute the ball beats midwicket
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 2 runs clips it away off his pads again wide of midwicket
Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, 1 run ungainly shot by Warner, makes room and the ball flies off the toe of the bat and just drops short of Asif at third man
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, no run picks the slower ball a little too late and he lunges forward and pushes it towards mid-off
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run drifts on the pads and he works it to the on side
Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, 1 run plays his favourite shot - the pull - it travels flat and quick but there's cover at deep square leg

Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 2 runs slower ball clipped wide of square leg, he has to hurry back for the second and the throw is pretty much on target but the bowler fumbles and clips the bails with his hands instead
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run plays a short-arm pull down to deep square leg
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 2 runs shuffles across his stumps early and deliberately clips him wide of square leg
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run excellent running, he drops the ball in front of cover and calls immediately, puts pressure on the infield

Mohammad Asif to Warner, SIX runs That's a Warner special! He latches on to a short of a length delivery and just whams it over deep midwicket, he's caught but by the spectator over the fence, somebody give him a VB! It's on me
Mohammad Asif to Warner, 1 run gets a leading edge to the off side and he hurries the single
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run tries to play it down to third man but he misses it
Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, 1 run makes room bur checks his shot and ends up chopping it wide of cover
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 2 runs grants him width and he slices it wide of point, Gul charges across from third man and mops up

Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run opportunity missed by Pakistan! Clarke drops it towards extra cover and takes a big risk, he looked in real danger of being run out but Khalid Latif's throw at the bowler's end cleared Mt Everest
Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, 3 runs goes for an ungainly heave but the ball drops in the middle of nowhere in the deep on the off side
Naved-ul-Hasan to Clarke, 1 run width again and he gets a thick outside edge this time to third man
Naved-ul-Hasan to Warner, 1 run makes room and squirts it wide of cover point for a single
Mohammad Asif to Warner, 1 run stays beside the line and pushes it wide of cover and calls immediately
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run lovely delivery, Clarke is very circumspect as he gets forward to drive and the late movement beats the outside edge
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run gets to the pitch of the ball and pushes it to mid-off
Mohammad Asif to Warner, 2 runs Dropped Stiff chance, Warner swings at a slow delivery and Asif is a bit late to react, the ball deflects off his fingers to long-on

Mohammad Asif to Warner, OUT fell for the trap! Warner makes a lot of room to crash that over the off side, the ball is there to be hit but he doesn't spot the fielder Imran Nazir at deep point, easy catch
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 1 run on the pads and he clips it down to square leg for a single
Malik to Clarke, FOUR runs lot of intent there, he uses his feet, gets to the pitch of the ball and plays an exquisite airborne drive over the covers, the fielder in the deep had no chance
Malik to Clarke, 1 run steps down and turns it towards mid-on
Malik to Hussey, 1 run gives him width but he ends up chopping it down to point
Malik to Clarke, 2 runs squirts it behind square on the off side but the running is good, complete the second easily
Malik to Clarke, 1 run chops it towards short third man and sets off immediately
Malik to Hussey, 1 run shuffles and clips it behind square on the on side for a single
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run top edges the pull and it falls safe! Hussey isn't in control of that shot and the fielder from deep square charges forward
Umar Gul to Clarke, 1 run pushes it towards backward point and sets off, Fawad does really well to slide and save another run, good cricket all round
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run edges it to the pads and the ball rolls to cover and he risks the single, the throw was wide

Umar Gul to Clarke, OUT good reflexes! Clarke gets slightly forward and beside the line to slash it away over the off side, but Fawad is alert at point and cups his hands behind that screamer, he kept his eyes on the ball which was like a bolt of lightning
Umar Gul to White, no run full on the off stump and he pushes it towards mid-off
Umar Gul to White, 1 wide bowls it short but down the leg side
Umar Gul to White, 1 run gets forward and pushes it just wide of backward point
Malik to White, 1 run flatter delivery and he pushes it with the turn down to long-on
Malik to Hussey, no run stays back and pushes it down to mid-off
Malik to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-on
Malik to White, 1 run punches it to the off side for a single
Malik to Hussey, 1 run gets to the pitch of it and pushes it to long-on
Malik to White, no run slow and wide outside off and chopped down to cover
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run full and swinging in, he pushes it through the line to Asif at long-off
Umar Gul to White, no run drops it shorter, gets it to nip back in and nearly slices him in half, the ball hits his hips and rolls to the off side
Umar Gul to White, 1 run full on the off stump and he gently pushes it down to long-off
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run short and drifting on the body, he shuffles and clips him to the on side

Umar Gul to White, OUT fabulous cricket from Pakistan! Gul catches White all at sea with a short delivery, the ball lobs off White's body and lobs to Fawad at point, Gul thinks White got some glove on it and they go up for the catch, but an unsettled and dazed White ambles out of his crease and an alert Fawad fires the throw at the
Umar Gul to Birt, 1 run full on the pads and he works him down to long-on, first runs in Australia colours

Malik to Birt, OUT forgettable debut in the end for Birt, Malik comes round the wicket and fires it flat on the stumps, Birt goes a long way across and tries to paddle it away, the ball crashes on to leg and middle
Malik to Haddin, no run defends with soft hands and the ball nearly dribbles back to his stumps
Malik to Haddin, no run gets forward and drives back to the bowler
Malik to Haddin, 1 run gets forward and drives him down to long-off
Malik to Hussey, 1 run gets beside the line and steers him to the off side

Malik to Haddin, 1 wide, OUT it's a wide down the leg side and Pakistan aren't complaining at all! Cleverly bowled, fires it down the leg side on seeing Haddin come down the pitch, Kamran does well to follow the line and whip off the bails, he's a long way out
Malik to Smith, 1 run gets off the mark with a clip down to square leg
Ajmal to Smith, 1 run meanwhile his namesake pinches a single to point
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-on
Ajmal to Smith, 1 run sower through the air and he rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover
Ajmal to Hussey, no run quicker one, gets turn and bounce, Hussey nearly chops it onto his stumps
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run knocks it behind square leg
Ajmal to Smith, no run
Malik to Hussey, 1 run gets to the pitch of the ball and drives him down to long-on
Malik to Smith, no run makes room to cut but misses
Malik to Smith, FOUR runs lot of confidence in that shot! He chips down the track early and carves him over extra cover, bisects 2 fielders in the deep
Malik to Smith, 1 run shuffles and clips him behind square on the on side
Malik to Hussey, SIX runs that goes rows back! Hussey chips down the track, gets his high backlift down on the ball and lofts with the turn, lands several rows over wide long-on
Malik to Hussey, 1 run
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, no run taps it towards extra cover and sets off very quickly, has to dive at the crease
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, no run swings at it outside off and fails to connect
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 2 runs slower yorker and he does well to whips it away past square leg
Naved-ul-Hasan to Hussey, 1 run full on the stumps and pushed to long-on

Naved-ul-Hasan to Smith, OUT the slower ball from hell! That was actually a googly! Naved foxes Smith who doesn't quite know whether to play at it or not, the ball cuts back in and slices him in half, he won't want to see a replay of that
Naved-ul-Hasan to Johnson, no run fires it quicker and the ball skids onto his pads
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run squeezes it out to third man and he has to hurry for the single, the throw is wide
Ajmal to Johnson, no run full on the off stump and driven to mid-off
Ajmal to Johnson, no run speeds past the outside edge, phew that was close
Ajmal to Johnson, no run
Ajmal to Johnson, 2 runs tries to heave it to the on side and nearly chops it onto his stumps, very nearly the 8th wicket there
Ajmal to Johnson, no run skids through and he pushes it to the off side
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run full on the off stump and he drives to the off side

Umar Gul to Johnson, OUT it gets worse for Australia! Another terrific delivery, Gul bangs it in really short and it's a snorter, Johnson desperately sways backward to evade it and the ball brushes his glove, Kamran knows it
Umar Gul to Nannes, 1 run low full toss and he clips it down to deep midwicket
Umar Gul to Hussey, FOUR runs oh nice stuff! Gul errs by dropping it short and giving him width, Hussey backs away and times the cut really well, beats third man

Umar Gul to Hussey, 2 runs brilliant fielding! Pakistan where were you all this while? The batsman pounds it down the ground and Naved at long-on sprints to his left and just manages to pull it back, that looked an obvious four
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run full on the pads and squeezed out to the on side
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run full on the pads and he clips it to square leg
Ajmal to Nannes, no run tossed up on the pads and worked to the on side
Ajmal to Nannes, 3 runs outside edge beats slip, puts pressure on nazir at third man, good running by Hussey to get back for the third
Ajmal to Hussey, 1 run, OUT not so good running this time! Hussey rocks back and pulls a slower short delivery, mixup in the running and Umar fires the throw to the bowler's end, he's gone by a mile
Ajmal to Hussey, no run fires that in very quick and he pushes it back to the bowler
Ajmal to Hussey, SIX runs take that! Hussey steps down the pitch on seeing the flight and carts that long and high over wide long-on
Umar Gul to Tait, 1 run does well to squeeze out a fast yorker, he risks a single to Fawad at point and the throw was just wide, he was a goner otherwise
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run backs away from his crease and Gul does well to bowl the bouncer, Hussey swishes at thin air
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run circumspect running again, squeezes it out to the off side and the throw to the bowler's end is wide
Umar Gul to Tait, OUT easy catch for Alam this time, Tait gets forward to a pitched up delivery and ends up spooning it straight to point

While we wait for Pakistan's response, check out our
It won't be easy because the TV commentators are saying this is the fastest MCG wicket they've seen. Join us shortly.

It's been Pakistan all the way so far, save for a brief period in the beginning when Warner and Clarke were hitting it around. Pakistan picked themselves up with their fielding and disciplined bowling. That double strike by Malik was the turning point. They've done all the hard work to get this far. They shouldn't mess this up.
3 slips for Tait
Tait to Farhat, no run 156 kph! Take that! Short outside off and he slashes at it, beaten for pace
Tait to Farhat, no run 159 kph! The gun's not kidding, this one skids through and hits his pads before he can blink
Tait to Farhat, no run 160.7 kph! Phew, full outside off and Farhat reaches out to drive and he misses
Tait to Farhat, 1 wide 150 kph, down the leg side and Farhat tries to run it down to fine leg and he misses
Tait to Farhat, 4 runs 157 kph, that's a half volley outside off and he squeezes it past the covers, the ball slows down before the rope
Tait to Farhat, no run 155 kph, he
Tait to Farhat, no run
Nannes to Imran Nazir, no run 147.1 kph, bowls it on a good length outside off, leaves it to the keeper
Nannes to Imran Nazir, no run this one rears up on him and he manages to get his arms high to fend it off
Nannes to Imran Nazir, no run 149 kph, full and wide outside off, Nazir goes for a desperate slash and misses
Nannes to Imran Nazir, no run that's a short one, fizzer really, I don't think they're able to see the ball well enough, pulls and misses
Nannes to Farhat, no run 149 kph, digs out a yorker and he leaps up and deflects it to the on side
Tait to Kamran, 1 run 152 kph,
Tait to Farhat, no run this one fizzes past the outside edge, holds its line outside the off stump
Tait to Farhat, FOUR runs fires it full on the off stump, he gets to the pitch of the ball and crashes it past mid-off and cover
Tait to Khalid Latif, no run 150.6 kph, hits it short of a length and the ball fizzes past the outside edge
Tait to Khalid Latif, no run gets beside the line and steers him to the off side
Nannes to Kamran, no run short of a length and steered toward backward point
Nannes to Kamran, 3 runs short ball and in a flash he pulls it over the in field, the ball drops safe of any catchers and just sort of stops there
Nannes to Khalid Latif, 1 run punches this one into the off side
Nannes to Kamran, FOUR runs clears his leg and biffs the ball nicely over mid-on, just picked the length and dumped it over the fielder for four
Nannes to Kamran, 2 runs this time he slashes over the off side, just wide of a leaping cover fielder, Warner jumps up and cannot get to it
Nannes to Kamran, FOUR runs better length and better footwork from Akmal, who punches the ball into the gap at cover and runs hard but ends up slowing down when he sees the ball win that race
Johnson to Khalid Latif, FOUR runs tries to unsettle Latif with bounce and pace - 158ks - but he smacks it over square leg
Johnson to Khalid Latif, 1 run short on the body and he jumps up and taps it to midwicket
Johnson to Kamran, 2 runs continues swinging, lashing a short ball from outside off stump and miscuing it over mid-on, the ball drops safely and Akmal survives
Johnson to Kamran, FOUR runs another swing and again he goes over wide mid-on, he's just swinging freely
Johnson to Kamran, 1 wide bowls a yorker but its wide of off stump, Akmal backs away and misses and a wide is called
Johnson to Kamran, 2 runs pitches on a length and Akmal punches a lovely flowing shot over mid-on's head
Johnson to Kamran, SIX runs fuller ball on about middle and off stump and he again unfurls a lovely punchy drive, high and high and over the ropes down the ground, that is a straight six
Watson to Khalid Latif, no run pitches it up and Latif pushes off the front foot to extra cover
Watson to Khalid Latif, no run wafts at a short ball that sits up nicely and cannot connect

Watson to Khalid Latif, OUT gets his man with the incutter! Pitches length, a slower ball it seems, and cuts back off the track to hit Latif on the flap as he shapes to work it away, looks to the naked eye as its headed into leg stump and so the umpire agrees ... but, but, but replays show a thin inside edge so Latif is unlucky, a b
Watson to Malik, no run short of a length and he gets back to defend
Watson to Malik, no run
Watson to Malik, no run fuller ball, he drives down the track and Watson fields well
Johnson to Kamran, 1 run short down leg stump, he jumps up and tucks it to fine leg
Johnson to Malik, no run fuller ball, lovely push off the front foot, but Smith at mid-off intercepts to save four, well stopped lad
Johnson to Malik, no run fuller even, and again he drives, this time a forceful drive that cannot beat cover
Johnson to Malik, 1 run short ball, 144ks, tucks him up but he does well to ride with the bounce and drop the ball in front of cover, and sets off for the run, that is well done
Johnson to Kamran, no run gets some good bounce and beats the bat this time
Johnson to Kamran, no run short of a length, he gets up and angles the bat for the cut but cannot time it well and cover fields
Watson to Malik, 1 run leans into the ball and drives all along the carpet to extra cover where Johnson runs across and fields
Watson to Kamran, 1 run fuller ball just outside off and Akmal square-drives with power
Watson to Malik, 1 run slaps a short and wide ball over cover and the sweeper fields
Watson to Kamran, FOUR runs slammed! Super shot from Akmal, spotting the short ball and walloping it over midwicket
Watson to Kamran, FOUR runs bad bowling, short and wide and Akmal frees the arms, just using the pace to slap that behind backward point, in the air but who cares because third man is far
Watson to Kamran, no run change of pace, he dabs the ball and gets send back
Tait to Malik, 1 leg bye full ball well down the pads, gets a bit of boot on the flick
Tait to Kamran, 1 run on a length, 152ks, and on-driven down to wide mid-on
Tait to Malik, no run pitches it up, 156ks, Malik drives a good-looking shot straight to mid-off
Tait to Umar Akmal, no run on-drives the ball off his pads to the midwicket area
Tait to Umar Akmal, no run 151.7ks, short outside off, he flashes and gets beat by the bounce
Johnson to Kamran, no run
Johnson to Kamran, 1 leg bye goes to pull again and gets struck in the underarm, he was into the shot too early, the ball was short and there to be put away
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run back of a length on the stumps and he defends
Johnson to Umar Akmal, 2 runs too fine and he tucks it down off the pads for two, sprinting really hard and gets back just in time
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run good ball, short of a length on the stumps and he hops back to defend
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run angles across at pace, 151ks, and height and beats the bat as Umar hops up and flirts outside off stump
Smith to Kamran, 1 run tossed up on a length, gets some turn, Kamran clears the leg and slashes hard, mistiming the shot over cover but it lands safely in the deep
Smith to Umar Akmal, no run the wrong un, to which Akmal goes back and punches to midwicket
Smith to Umar Akmal, no run fuller ball, gets some drift, punched straight to extra cover
Smith to Umar Akmal, 1 run too straight and Umar gets this one away to short fine leg
Smith to Kamran, FOUR runs too wide and Kamran slashes the ball over cover for four
Smith to Kamran, 2 runs tossed up, loopy delivery down leg stump and he paddles it away
Nannes to Umar Akmal, no run good length on leg stump, straightens, and Umar defends it back
Nannes to Umar Akmal, 2 runs good length ball, angles away, Umar pokes at it and edges down into the ground wide of slip, who dives to his right and takes pace off the ball
Nannes to Umar Akmal, 1 run short ball this time into the ribs, he gets over it and turns it to midwicket
Nannes to Kamran, 1 run short again, stays low, he swivels and drags it down to short fine
Nannes to Umar Akmal, 1 run uses his crease and dabs the ball in front of cover, it was a tad wide
Nannes to Kamran, SIX runs hello, dolly! That is six! Nannes goes short, Kamran reaches out and clubs that ever so forcefully over wide midwicket for maximum to raise his half-century
Smith to Umar Akmal, 1 run spins away from a length, he goes back and cuts to backward point, there's some hesitation between the brothers and they end up running
Smith to Kamran, no run fuller ball, pushed off the front foot to cover
Smith to Kamran, FOUR runs shot man! Kamran uses his feet, makes room, and drills the ball between two men in the covers, superb placement
Smith to Kamran, 2 runs too short and he rocks back in a flash to pull it through midwicket
Smith to Kamran, 2 runs tossed up, pitches middle and leg, he shuffles and drives past midwicket
Smith to Kamran, 1 run gets over this one and cuts from off stump towards point
Watson to Kamran, 1 run pitched up, he pushes it back in the air just over a leaping Watson, just chipped the slower ball in the air and the bowler just could not get to it
Watson to Umar Akmal, 2 runs good running! Umar dabs the ball gently wide of backward point, sets off, and comes back for the second
Watson to Umar Akmal, 2 runs turns this one across the stumps and finds the gap at square leg
Watson to Umar Akmal, no run length ball, dabbed to backward point
Watson to Umar Akmal, 1 run hits a length, lures him forward again, and he angles it to third man

Watson to Kamran, 1 run dropped by Johnson at deep square leg! Kamran just picks the ball up off his pads over the infield, Johnson runs in and gets onto his knees to take a regulation catch but the ball pops out
Tait to Fawad Alam, no run short of a length, 152ks, and Fawad tucks it back to Tait
Tait to Fawad Alam, no run 150ks, again short of a length and cramping Fawad, who slices it to point
Tait to Fawad Alam, no run slower ball, just 127ks, on the pads and pushed back to Tait
Tait to Fawad Alam, 1 run on a length, bringing him forward, and he pushes to point
Tait to Umar Akmal, 1 run hurled down at 150.6ks, not nearly the yorker he wanted, and Umar opens the face and jams the ball down to third man for a single
Smith to Umar Akmal, 2 runs goes for the big sweep and top-edges over midwicket, ball lands safely
Smith to Umar Akmal, 1 run makes room and dances out, drilling the ball past extra cover
Smith to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run flatter one, he gets in line and pushes to the off
Smith to Naved-ul-Hasan, 1 run gets off the mark with a nudge into the spaces
Smith to Umar Akmal, 2 runs slower, drifting into leg stump, Umar clips it nicely past midwicket
Johnson to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run ouch! Rana is undone by the short ball that sits up and smacks him in the grill as he takes his eyes off it and wafts loosely, but he shoos away attention in a flash
Johnson to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run pushes at one short of a length and steers to slip
Johnson to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run gets some room and dabs the ball to Clarke at backward point
Johnson to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run hits a length, Rana pushes off the front foot to cover
Johnson to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run goes full and beats the bat as Rana flashes a drive off the front foot
Johnson to Naved-ul-Hasan, no run excellent over from Johnson, and the third maiden of the innings! Short of a length, Rana dabs the ball again straight to the captain at backward point
Smith to Umar Akmal, 1 run tossed up, uses his feet and drives down to long-on for one
Smith to Umar Gul, SIX runs oh hello, whats this? First ball, and Umar tees off for six over wide long-on, just getting under the loopy delivery and giving it all he's got, amazing shot that
Smith to Umar Gul, 1 run flatter, shorter ball, and he gets back and punches to cover
Smith to Umar Akmal, 1 run fuller ball drifting into the pads, clipped out to the deep for one
Smith to Umar Gul, 1 run the wrong un, just short of a length, Gul goes back and punches to cover
Nannes to Umar Gul, no run short ball, pitches outside leg and dashes across, Gul takes his eyes off it and ducks into it
Nannes to Umar Gul, no run another short ball, 146ks, Gul sways back as it sails over
Nannes to Umar Gul, no run 144ks, short outside off, Gul swings and connects with air

Nannes to Umar Gul, 2 runs ah, close to a catch! Gul clears his leg and throws the bat on the ball, getting a thick outer edge that flies down toward third man where Tait runs in and slides to his knees but the ball just does not carry
Nannes to Umar Gul, no run another swing and a miss as Gul heaves at a short ball
Watson to Ajmal, 1 run slogs at one short of a length and gets some bat on ball, scampering down as Watson and midwicket run to field
Watson to Mohammad Asif, 1 run short of a length again, angling across Asif who pokes and runs it down to third man
Watson to Ajmal, no run swing and a miss! Watson goes for a short ball into Ajmal who heaves and cannot make contact
Watson to Ajmal, 1 leg bye makes room and charges out to a short ball, which slams into his helmet and runs wide of backward point, they just get one to that means Asif needs six to tie

Watson to Mohammad Asif, FOUR runs well he gets four but that is not enough! Asif backs away and flat-bats a short ball over mid-on four four but Australia win a thriller to sweep the Tests, ODIs, and Twenty20 of what has been a pretty one-sided series, congratulations to them

So Pakistan leave Australia without a single win. Another poor tour Down Under. Hope you've enjoyed our coverage of this series. Thanks for your company. That is all we have for you but remember, tomorrow is a Test match between the two best sides and in a couple days Australia will go back to playing West Indies. There is also the series

What a game, absolutely riveting. Pakistan did so well to shoot Australia out for 127 but their batting, apart from Kamran, was abysmal against a very determined attack. Tait was quick, very quick, and his three wickets for 13 runs were incredibly crucial to Australia winning. Nannes was Nannes, Johnson came back after a horror first over
Australia won by 2 runs
Player of the match is Shaun Tait, AUS
